item.title: Neural Networks: Supervised, Unsupervised & Reinforcement Learning Types of Learning
item.description: There are 3 types of learning Supervised learning Reinforcement learning Unsupervised learning Supervised Learning In supervised learning we try to predict an output when given an input vector. Input and target are clear in supervised learning. Regression - target ouptut is a real numbers or a vector of real numbers Classification - target output is a class label Model-class is a function: \begin{equation} y = f(x; W) \end{equation}
